Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Coney Island in 1969...
Had first career hit (triple) on 9/26/1970, off Todd Cangelosi (TRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/1971, off Frances Prunty (TRO)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1971, hitting .288 with 23 HR, 78 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1972, hitting .593 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1973, hitting .308 with 37 HR, 92 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Gashouse on 8/19/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1976, hitting .517 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 4/9/1977 with a Broken Foot, out for 11 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 6/1/1979...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1979, hitting .354 with 10 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1980, hitting .594 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1980, hitting .419 with 8 HR, 29 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 10/8/1980...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1980...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1981, hitting .375 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1981...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 4/21/1982...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Gashouse on 5/4/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1982, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1983...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/16/1984, off Frank Durham (LYN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1984, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/26/1984...
Injured on 4/8/1985 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 5/4/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1985, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1985, hitting .374 with 9 HR, 20 RBI...
